duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly customer service, take orders, and process payments efficiently.
Maintain cleanliness by cleaning tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Work as a team to ensure continuity of service, assisting other crewmembers in completion of tasks and assignments.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food, ensuring food safety standards are met.
Show up to scheduled shifts on time, work under pressure, and at a fast pace with a focus on balance between working hard and having fun.

education_certification.credential: Must be 16 years of age or older
